text: set up a reminder “if you’re working on the BL 2016 Onboarding JIRA project please post updates to your status (with ticket numbers if relevant)” in this channel at 10am every Tuesday and Thursday, Pacific Daylight Time.

FYI <!here|@here>, wanted to try something r.e. keeping everyone in the loop on what the status is on tasks around the BL 2016 onboarding jira project: just set up twice weekly in slack reminders to give status updates on your tasks. 

these will pop up tuesday and thursdays at 10am, and should give us a chance to check in with each other a bit more asynchronously, and also call out anything that might be blocking you from work
sort of like stand up, but virtually/in slack
seems like the lowest lift to getting everyone on the same page without dragging everyone into a room
